Several countries, states and cities have also imposed [[smoking ban]]s in most public buildings. -- changed "places" to "buildings" - otherwise, "several" is too large a statement
/* The social stigma */ reworded POV terms
/* The social stigma */ no need to repeat previous sections that specifically
/* The social stigma */ + wikilink List of smoking bans
/* The social stigma */ put in an opposite side to this, rm NPOV
/* The social stigma */ add wikilink [[four humors|humorism]] as humorism is not funny humor format
/* The social stigma */ , as early as the book [[A Counterblaste to Tobacco]]
moved some statements and refs out the lead, some ref cleanup
/* Smoking in culture */ switched to a burning skull-pic with higher contrast

/* Public health */ tweaked statement about legislation against selling to minors; removed source that doesn't describe the relevant issue, removed irrelevant POV-statement about Chinese public health

Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/Peter Isotalo|Peter Isotalo]]; Uhmm yes, you cant have Refrences as title, then Notes...it will be two seprate sections then.
What I thought was a questionable addition to this article was found to be grounded in historical evidence. Referenced and reworded so as not to appear POV.
/* See also */ repeating rather vital links under a very short "See also"-list is not a problem
/* See also */ Let's not repeat links already in the article, shall we?
added image at top and adjusted sizes of both

tweak to use of hard narcotics statement
fixed the panacea link in the intro
/* The Middle East */ changed constanople to istanbul, since it's supposed to be a list of muslim cities.
removed one fact tag per discussion at [[User talk:Nmg20#More smoking]]
removed poor-quality stoner pic and Tolkien-cruft
/* Public health */ removed original research; see [[Talk:Smoking#health]]
converted some print references to shorthand and moved full info under "Sources"
New wording: change suffer to have. Suffer is not NPOV either. "Have" is.
revert; that's a bit too relativistic to be considered NPOV
/* Public health */ suffer -> experience. suffering is subjective only if you want to live to old age or not
Date/fix the maintenance tags or gen fixes using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
remove one fact tag; the number of smokers in the world is referenced in the first sentence of "Social effects"
revert revamping of references; listing the sources separately makes it a lot easier to get an overview and makes the notes easier to read
Added fact requests, sourced medical claims in intro.
Tweaked references for simplicity & to avoid unnecessary repetition.
/* Sub-Saharan Africa */ cut down on details about the Bena Diemba and rearranged paragraphs somewhat
stating facts with sources, no personal conclusions
please don't remove statements that *are* supported by sources (previous edit summary was accidently truncated)
removed personal conclusions, reverted sectioning; the info on smoking bans concerns public health
/* Public health and crime */ rm and crime - where's the crime aspect?
/* Public health and crime */ removed unreferenced statement
changing intro sentence--shouldn't define smoking only as a recreational practice when it is also a ritual one; remainder of paragraph establishes these uses
